Welcome to

Da Nang, Vietnam

Connecting you to Da Nang

Arts, culture, creativity, entrepreneurship and more come together in Da Nang, Viet Nam. Whether you've come for the sunshine, the coffee culture, or to connect with the city's vibrant digital nomad community, we'll tap you in to the best Da Nang has to offer. Our cafe, coworking space and hostel is a gathering place for entrepreneurs, startups, and anybody seeking a supportive community. Visit us today at our location in Da Nang.

Open Mon to Sat 7am - 5pm

Location & Directions

Join our community

We connect you to talent, mentorship and opportunities in Da Nang

What's the best way to level up your skills or give your business a boost? Surround yourself with talented, highly-motivated people who will inspire and empower you to do more! Live with us, cowork with us, or just drop in for an event. Our emphasis on community and entrepreneurship means you'll get to connect with the right people.

Hostel

Stay with Us

Enjoy staying with us in the heart of Nimmanhaemin, a hip, happening and highly walkable neighborhood popular with digital nomads and travelers of all stripes. Draper Startup House Da Nang offers comfortable accommodations along with a stylish place to work and hang out. Our cozy space has an 8-bed mixed dorm, two private queen rooms which share a bath, and one king room with private ensuite bath. Our guests also have access to coworking space, meetings rooms, and community events. Whether you're on a bootstrap budget or a business traveler, we're here to make your stay in Da Nang both comfortable and productive.

Book a Room

Coworking

Become a Member

Coworking is a great way to meet new people, stimulate your creativity, and learn from those around you. Members at Draper Startup House get so much more than just wifi and a desk, we also provide mentorship, networking and events curated specifically to support entrepreneurs and startups. We offer Day Passes for casual visitors, Flex Passes for those who just like a place to drop in from time to time, or Monthly Memberships which give you 24-hour access and more. Explore our membership packages to find the right fit for your coworking needs and see what amenities we offer.

See Memberships

Events

Connect with Community

From casual meetups to expert-led workshops, we host events that connect, inspire and empower entrepreneurs. Alongside masterminds, panel talks and business-oriented events, we also offer yoga, board game and movie nights, brunch and other casual events that help you to connect around your interests without the stuffiness of traditional networking. We're committed to community, and maintain an active roster of events year-round. If you're looking for a venue to host your next workshop or event, get in touch, we support partners and service providers who share our mission.

Whether you’re enjoying our co-working or staying with us, being a member has perks!

Our Mission

To enable 1 million entrepreneurs…

With 9 locations and counting, our international hostels provide opportunity for traveling startups, digital nomads, creatives, and the larger entrepreneurial community to connect to new opportunities, inspire one another to innovate and execute, and empower one another to GO BIG, give back, and drive progress.

Whether you’re visiting one of our hostels in Bali, Indonesia or in Austin TX, you’ll find the same valued approach drives each experience – real human connection, inspired business travel, a diverse-minded community and access to global citizens. Our hostels provide a place to fuel your ideas, to learn and grow, or even to just hang out and meet new and interesting people in some of the most exciting areas of the world.
